roleset.name: to place into a package again

example.name: explosives
example.text: It *EXP*-1 took months *PRO* to repackage and redesign the load of high explosives that was eventually used against the 'Cole'.
example.arg: the load of high explosives that

roleset.note: REPACKAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'repackage' based on ebn instances. frame by Perryn (from repackage.01-v predicate notes)
